content:
Beergarden

Located by the magnificent Torre Glories (old Agbar tower) and next to the new Chök food truck, the Beergarden is a delicious space where you can enjoy a careful selection of craft beers and a tempting cuisine at any time of the year . The idyllic place to enjoy with family, on weekends, visit with your pet or come by bicycle; the place where you will find the best place to enjoy an original brunChök, appetizer, afterwork with colleagues or a romantic dinner ... .

Contact us
